wl:page.wl:sentence: Let's savor all the things.

wl:page.wl:sentence: First, the Pacific Rim 2 movie is actually happening, after a year of swirling rumors.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: CC RB PRP VBZ VBG VBN , IN NNP NNP VBD NNP IN NNP NNP : NNP NNP VBZ CD VBG DT NN IN DT NN IN NNP NNP NNP NNP NNP NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: And now it's being cast, with John Boyega (Finn from Star Wars: The Force Awakens ) joining the team as the son of Stacker Pentecost (Idris Elba).

wl:sentence.wl:pos: DT VBZ NNP NNP VBZ DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: That means Mako Maki has a brother!

wl:sentence.wl:pos: MD PRP VB VBG IN NNP POS NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: Will she be drifting with Boyega's character?

wl:sentence.wl:pos: PRP VBP DT NN , IN DT NNS IN DT NN VBP VBN VBN RB , CC NN VBZ RB DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: We have no idea, because no details of the story have been released yet, but shooting starts late this year.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: IN NN , NNP NNP NN NNP NNP NNP VBZ RB VBN IN PRP VBZ IN NN IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: In fact, Pacific Rim director Guillermo del Toro has even hinted that he's at work on a script for the third movie in the franchise.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NNP NNP NNP IN DT NN IN NNP POS NN : `` PRP VBP RB JJ CC JJ TO VB NNP IN DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: Said del Toro in a statement about Boyega's casting : "I am very proud and happy to welcome John into a fantastic sandbox.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: DT NNP NNP NN MD VB VBN IN PRP IN DT VBG NN IN PRP VBZ TO VB DT JJ , JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: The Pacific Rim universe will be reinforced with him as a leading man as it continues to be a multicultural, multi-layered world.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NN DT NNP VBG DT NN NN VBD PRP$ NN CC PRP MD RB VB IN DT JJR NN IN DT NN . '' NNS IN DT JJ NN VBD DT NN PRP VBD NN , JJ NNS IN RB VBG IN DT FW FW NN NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: ‘The World saving the world’ was our goal and I couldn’t think of a better man for the job." Fans of the original movie loved the way it developed complex, heart-breaking characters while never scrimping on the kaiju vs. jaeger action.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NNP MD VB DT NN RB IN NNP CD CC VBN IN DT JJ NN VBD JJ IN DT NN , EX MD RB VB DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: Universal will release the sequel everywhere except China—but given that the first film was huge in that country, there will likely be a local distributor.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: RB , NNP NNP POS NN VBD RB JJ TO DT JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: Indeed, Pacific Rim 's success was largely due to the global market.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: PRP VBD DT NN WDT VBN RB IN DT NN , CC PRP VBD JJS IN PRP$ NN RB .

wl:page.wl:sentence: It was a film that translated well across every continent, and it made most of its money overseas.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: IN DT NNP MD VB VBG IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN , DT NN MD VB JJ NN NNP NNP NNP , VBN IN VBG JJ IN DT NNP NN IN NNP CC IN PRP$ NN IN NNP CC NNP DT NNP NNP .

wl:page.wl:sentence: Though del Toro will be working as a producer of the new film, the director will be award-winning screenwriter Steven S. DeKnight, known for helming several of the Spartacus series for Starz and for his work on Daredevil and Buffy the Vampire Slayer .

wl:sentence.wl:pos: NNP VBZ RB VBN IN JJ NNS , CC PRP VBZ DT NN IN VBG JJ NN IN JJ NNS .

wl:page.wl:sentence: DeKnight has also written for several comics, and he has a flair for combining white-hot action with meaty stories.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: DT NN MD RB VB IN JJR NNS .

wl:page.wl:sentence: The movie couldn't be in better hands.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: PRP VBP VB CD VBG NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: I do have one lingering question.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: VBD RB PRP VBP IN DT JJ NN WDT NNP VBD DT NNS , CC PRP$ VBN NN NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN .

wl:page.wl:sentence: Didn't we learn in the first film that Stacker had no children, and his adopted daughter Mako was his only family?

wl:sentence.wl:pos: DT VBZ WRB PRP VBD RB JJ TO VB PRP IN DT NN , RB IN PRP VBD DT RBS JJ NN IN PRP DT .

wl:page.wl:sentence: That's why he was so unwilling to let her into the field, even though she was the most badass fighter of them all.

wl:sentence.wl:pos: IN WRB VBZ NNP VB IN DT .

wl:page.wl:sentence: So where does Boyega come into this?

wl:sentence.wl:pos: PRP VBP NN IN VBG DT NN VBZ NNS , RB RB JJ NN VBG DT NN NN CD NN NNP NNP , WP MD VB IN NNP NNP NNP . CD .

wl:page.wl:sentence: I'm sort of hoping the answer involves clones, possibly even mad science using some kaiju tissue (paging Charlie Day, who could return as Dr. Newton Geiszler!).
